snippet: Martinez allowed four hits in seven and one-third scoreless innings, helping St. Louis win a matchup between the teams with the best records in baseball.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; New York Mets pitcher Steven Matz will miss at least month of season due to torn back muscle; other MLB news and scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Martinez allowed four hits in seven and one-third scoreless innings, helping St. Louis win a matchup between the teams with the best records in baseball.

headline.print_headline: Matz Is Likely to Miss at Least a Month, Adding to the Mets’ Injury Barrage
headline.main: Carlos Martinez Leads Cardinals Past Pirates
